## ProofNode.toJSON() method

JSON Representation of ProofNode with a hex values

**Signature:**

```typescript
toJSON(): {
        hash: string;
        children: string[];
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ hash: string; children: string\[\]; }

{\*} - ProofNode with hexes
